name: Snow Mo: Cannon Shooting Game
description: The most addictive game with the simplest control ever. The player will save the snow humans by destroying the snow balls.As night fell, the whole jungle was covered with snow. A fierce battle begins with the snow bears and the snow humans. Here the player will play for snow humans. The player will save the snow humans by destroying the snow balls.If the player fails, the snowmen will die and the game will be over. How to control:Tap to the direction you want to move, and Tap your finger to shoot the snowball. Tap the screen and drag your finger to shoot snowball Snow Mo: Cannon Shooting.
